title: Completion Criteria
description:
Builds a conditional function that returns true when all of its conditions are satisfied.
Some states (e.g MetaTasks) may use these criterias to determine when a task is finished.

AND.description: True when criteria1 and criteria2 are both true

items.description: Completion criteria on the right-hand side of the AND comparison

OR.description: True when either criteria1 or criteria2 is true
